info.report-description: LTE PHB statistics measurement (M51121) contains PM counters to monitor the performance of the IP Iub functionality per IP interface for each per hop behaviour.

kpi_info.title: period_duration
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_EF
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface, including framing characters, using Expedited Forwarding PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_EF
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_EF
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_EF
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Assured UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_BE
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets transmitted over the plain IP interface, including framing characters, using the Best Effort PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_BE
kpi_info.use: The total number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the plain IP interface within the Best Effort PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted over the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_BE
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Best Effort PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_BE
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Best Effort PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when an outbound packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_EF
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received over the plain IP interface, including framing characters, using Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_EF
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF4
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF3
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF2
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF1
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_BE
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received out of the interface, including framing characters, using the Best Effort PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_BE
kpi_info.use: The number of inbound packets that were successfully received within the Best Effort PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received on the plain IP interface within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
